document.title: SP307-J-Landscaping with Fruit

author.organization: The University of Tennessee Agricultural Extension Service

document.abstract: Fruit and nut crops may be valuable additions to the landscape if proper attention is paid to crop selection, site preparation and cultural practices following planting. By adequately addressing these points, an edible landscape may become a reality. The following guidelines will assist you in determining which fruit and nut crops to use and where to plant them to meet your landscape objectives.
